mapper.select: SELECT mno, mid, mpassword, memail, mname, mbirth, mphone, mregdate, menable, mpoint, mrole,cartcnt FROM member, (SELECT cartno, count(*) AS cartcnt FROM cartdetail WHERE isdeleted = 0 group by cartno) WHERE mid = #{mid} AND cartno = (SELECT cartno FROM member, cart WHERE mid=#{mid} AND member_mno = mno)
